articles.author: RT
articles.title: Americans say life's too short to waste on work - RT
articles.description: New surveys published this week show that American workers who lost or quit jobs during the Covid-19 pandemic may not rejoin the workforce anytime soon, if at all.
articles.content:
The US Chamber of Commerce recently polled 529 Americans who became unemployed during the pandemic and have yet to return to work.
Over half of the respondents (53%) said they are somewhat active or… [+2372 chars]

articles.title: How to see the comet Leonard as it nears Earth in coming days - NPR
articles.description: The comet was discovered less than a year ago near the orbit of Jupiter. Now, observers in North America can see it in the northeastern sky around sunrise.
articles.content:
Less than a year ago, when Comet Leonard was first discovered, it was still an incredibly dim and obscure chunk of rock traveling out near the orbit of Jupiter.
